description:
Beautiful, sunny and spacious one bedroom with courtyard view. Stylishly decorated, the modern apartment features a queen bed in the bedroom and a sleeping sofa in the living room. Close to subway and buses. The apartment features a work desk with blazing fast WiFi.

Beautiful, sunny and spacious one bedroom with courtyard view. Close to subway and buses.

Stylishly decorated, the apartment features a queen bed in the bedroom and a sleeping sofa in the living room. Three people can stay here very comfortably.

This apartment features a home office with blazing fast WiFi and work desk.

There is a dedicated closet with plenty of hanging space. A hair dryer, iron, and umbrella is provided. Soap and toiletries provided.

In the living room there is a comfortable sofa for lounging or TV watching with a large flat-screen TV. The sofa converts into a twin-size bed to accommodate an additional guest.

There is an A/C unit, or you can open the windows in nice weather.

High speed WiFi, 55' flat-screen TV, premium cable with HBO, Showtime and 200+ other premium channels with on-demand. An Xbox with Netflix is also included.

Small kitchen includes gas stove, oven, dishwasher and fridge, toaster, coffee maker, microwave, dishes, utensils, pots and pans.

Fresh, clean sheets and plenty of towels are provided. Coin-operated laundry facilities are located across the street.

There are many wonderful restaurants and take-out places within a block. The subway station is 2 blocks away.

What else can I tell you? Just ask!
name: Lux Modern, Quite 1 Bedroom near Central Park
